skins.shipDescription: Asashio-class destroyer number one C Asashio.
skins.selfIntroduction: Asashio-class nameship, Asashio. Arashio and I, along with our friends, formed the 8th DesDiv. Though we were disbanded in the end, I strongly believe that we'll be able to be together again one day. Commander... do you want to help me find them?
skins.acquisition: I am Asashio. I've come to join this fleet in order to search for my missing comrade. Commander, do you also have someone who you could not give up on?
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. If you don't want to set sail right away, why don't you rest first?
skins.details: I'd like to stay here forever... But at this rate, I won't be able to find Arashio.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Dampier Strait? I don't really want to think about that place anymore... More importantly, Commander, can you install another anti-air gun?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Happiness is a full belly and a good night's sleep.
skins.secretaryIdle3: *Yawns* ...It's already so late, but Commander is still at it... Please make sure to take care of yourself.
skins.secretaryTouch: Don't worry, I... am not afraid anymore!

skins.ENClientName: The Transfer Student Underneath the Dancing Petals
skins.shipDescription: My name is Asashio, and I just transferred here today. Pleased to meet you... Even though I might not be able to get caught up with the course work, Mr. Kitty and I will do our best.
skins.acquisition: My name is Asashio, and I just transferred here today. Pleased to meet you... Even though I might not be able to get caught up with the course work, Mr. Kitty and I will do our best.
skins.login: It's time to go to school again... Commander, want to walk with me?
skins.details: I wonder if I can find Arashio here at school...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: How nice it'd be to go to school with Arashio...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Mr. Kitty always likes to rub against peoples' legs.
skins.secretaryIdle3: *yawn*...It feels nice to take a nap during class, but... I probably shouldn't, right?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander... do you also want Mr. Kitty to rub against you?

skins.JPClientName: リンクスティップの雪化
skins.shipDescription: Happy New Year, Commander. I am here to spend the New Year with you. Would you be so kind as to first help me down from here?
skins.acquisition: Happy New Year, Commander. I am here to spend the New Year with you. Would you be so kind as to first help me down from here?
skins.login: Commander, would you like some hot tea and a mikan orange?
skins.details: So warm... Commander, would you like some? Here, you should enjoy hot tea like this... Fwoo, fwoo... Then just let the warmth spread over you.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Are you cold, Commander? ...That's no good. Mm, you'll warm up if I give you a hug like this.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I can't finish all the food that everyone brought... Commander, if you don't mind, could you help finish mine?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Even though we can't have a tea party during the w
